They come equipped with a flat-screen TV and a modern en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a fridge and private balcony offering views of the lake. The hotel is located 2 km from Fateh Sagar Lake. Udaipur Airport is about 25 km away. Bicycle rental services are available at the hotel. Yoga and cooking classes can be arranged at an additional cost Pratap Bhawan restaurant serves a selection of Indian and European food. It also offers room service for guests’ convenience.

A variety of beverages can be enjoyed at Sol Bar. 24-hour room service is available. It is 5.3 km to Margao Railway Station and 30 km to Dabolim Airport from Club Mahindra Emerald Palms, Goa.

address: 42 Golf Course Road, Sector 43, 122002 Gurgaon, India – Show map
hotel_description: One of our top picks in Gurgaon. Located just opposite DLF Golf Course and Country Club on Golf Course Road, Gurgaon, ANYA Gurgaon offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and wellness centre, The Amaltas Spa by Lóccitane and a fitness centre. Guests can relax at the lounge on the sun deck. The hotel is 20 km away from Indira Gandhi International Airport. New Delhi Railway Station is 25 km away. The property is located 16 km from the ancient Qutub Minar. Leisure Valley Park and the Kingdom of Dreams are just 6 km away. The DLF Cyber City Gurgaon is 6 km while the shopping areas and M G Road Malls are 2.5 km. ANYA Gurgaon offers valet parking, shops within the property and a meeting & banquet space. A tour desk and a concierge service can assist guests who are interested in sightseeing. The hotel offers car rental and currency exchange facilities as well. A business centre is also available on property. Each air-conditioned room features a safe, a flat-screen TV, a telephone, a minibar or a refrigerator. The attached bathroom has shower facilities. Dining options include NAYA, an all-day dining restaurant that serves a selection of Indian and International delights. Guests can enjoy a variety of International cuisines at Azul. A rooftop bar, the NAYA Beer Garden serves an extensive beer list and beer inspired food. Yibe is a poolside bar where refreshing beverages can be enjoyed.

hotel_description: One of our top picks in Alwar. Offering an ethnic and traditional Rajasthani architecture and located just 1 km away from the second largest artificial lake of India, Jaisamand Lake, Hotel Burja Haveli features a lush garden at its entrance and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The in-house restaurant serves a variety of local and Indian cuisines. The colourful markets of Alwar are located 4 km away from this property while the Siliserh Lake Palace is located 16 km away. The Sariska Tiger Reserve is located 33 km away. The Alwar Bus Station and Alwar Railway Station are located 7 km away while the Jaipur Airport is 150 km away.
